name: Modding Playground: Minesweeper
description:
Another implementation of the famous classic "Minesweeper".

Just playing: 
Simply download the game and enjoy it, nothing special about it :)

Modding:
This clone differs from others by having all of the classes, methods, and variables public and virtual (if applicable). See the GitHub page for more details:

https://github.com/TheAshenWolf/ModdingPlayground-Minesweeper
